definition[0]: if an event passes off well, badly etc, it happens in that way
example[0]: The visit passed off without any serious incidents.
definition[1]: to make people think that someone or something is another thing
example[1]: They bought up pieces of old furniture and passed them off as valuable antiques.
example[2]: He passed himself off as a doctor.
definition[2]: to pretend that something is more valuable than it really is in order to deceive people
example[3]: The company had passed off brand-name drugs as its own.
